name: Hidden Objects - Easter Secrets Egg Hunter
name_original: Hidden Objects - Easter Secrets Egg Hunter
description:
Easter is near, why not wait out the remaining days with an awesome Easter egg hunt! Polish up your observation skills before the big event! Solve puzzles and piece together the mystery one item at a time.

Features:
- A fun and challenging game that takes place in an exciting Easter egg hunt!
- Solve puzzles as you seek new hints
- Three types of hidden object modes: item pictures, silhouette, and word lists.
- Survive the Easter hunt and win the game!

How to Play:
- Look carefully at each screen as you try to locate and match items.
- Tap an item to collect it.
- If you get stuck, you can buy hints to help you out.
- Use the map to navigate to different areas.
